description: How to Be Spiritual: The Guru Within is presented by Abundant Publishing . This is a course designed to support you in following your passion and love for life. Spirituality is a lifestyle of accessing and expressing your highest potential.  Here you learn that life isn't about becoming someone else but about revealing who you really are. This course can easily be call "How to Be You" and if you have a feeling that there is more to you than how you are living take this course.
title: How to Be Spiritual
